kyis/ /yan lag bris pa de dag kun/ /bye ba'i zhing nas 'ongs pa ste/ /g.yo ba rnams dang shin tu bral/ /thams cad gos bzang cha lugs mdzes/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa stobs chen te/ /blta'o rdo rje snying po la/ /rnam par rtog dang rnam dpyod la/ /chos la

mos pa yang dag tu/ /mthong ste de nas de kun dang / /phyogs rnams bzhi por blta byas te/ /'dzum pa sngon du rab btang nas/ /'jam zhing snyan pa'i dbyangs su smras/ /rgyal sras mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnams/ /rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor yul/ /gang la rtog

can myos 'gyur ba/ /de dag bdag las mnyan par gyis/ /gang bsam gang gis ji lta bur/ /bsam gtan bsam byed dgos pa dag /'dod dang sdig pa rnams kyis dben/ /rnam par rtog bcas rnam dpyod bcas/ /dga' bde dben las skyes par yang / /bsam

gtan dang po skye ba yin/ /de lta bu yi rim tshul du/ /bzhi dang brgyad dang de bzhin bcu/ /mur 'dug bdag tu smra ba dang / /bsam gtan can rnams bsam gtan byed/ /nyan thos theg pa can rnams dang / /rang rgyal theg ldan de bzhin te/ /kun kyang rtag tu bsam gtan

byed/ /chos rnams dang ni sa dag gi/ /rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs pa dang / /phung po'i skye mched tshogs kyi rnams/ /'di dag thams cad bdag med de/ /byed pa med cing g.yo ba med/ /gsum po 'dus las rab tu byung / /'khrul 'khor ro langs 'dra ba ste/ /byed pa rnams

kyis rnam par spangs/ /thub pa phyi rol bsam gtan byed/ /stong par lta ba'i lta ba can/ /chos kyi mtshan la mos pa rnams/ /chud gson mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /phung po bdag med mkhas pa'i rnams/ /bsam gtan 'di 'drar bsam gtan byed/ /de bzhin gshegs

kyi bsam gtan dag /lha rdzas bsod nams lta sbyong ba/ /rnal 'byor can dang rgyal ba'i sras/ /mnyam bzhag rtag par bsam gtan byed/ /'di dag thams cad sems tsam ste/ /mtshan can mtshan nyid yod pa min/ /phung po rnams med khams yod min/ /

thams cad chos la mtshan nyid med/ /rdul phran rnam par gzhigs pa dang / /de dag de ltar mi gnas so/ /rtog pa bskyed pas brtags pa ni/ /dngos po sa dang chu la sogs/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin mi shes pa/ /mtshan nyid du yang rnam par rtog /kha dog sdug

dang mi sdug dang / /kha dog snang gzhan de bzhin te/ /'ja' dang in dra go ba ltar/ /kha dog sna mang sprin lta bu'i/ /sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra ba yis/ /thams cad 'gro ba kun bkang ste/ /rgyas pa'i skye mched ces bya bas/ /'byung ba rnams kyang rnam gzhigs te/ /

rnal 'byor shes pa gzugs can gyis/ /lus la rtag tu gzugs kyang mthong / /gang la dmigs te mnyam bzhag pa/ /de la dmigs shing rnam par ldang / /gang dang gang la rnam rtog pa/ /de dang de ni dmigs pa yin/ /rnal 'byor can med rnal 'byor med/ /

de ltar rnam par rtog pa ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor nyid/ /kun gzhi sa rnams thams cad dang / /thub pa'i rnal 'byor bde la gnas/ /chos dang chos kyi mtshan nyid kyang / /rtag tu rab tu rtogs byas shing / /mnyam par bzhag pa'i khyad par dag /

mnyam bzhag ldan pa rab tu ston/ /chos kyi rang bzhin rnam phye bas/ /rnal 'byor can gyi blo 'khrug pa/ /blo gros zhan pas rab tu skye/ /chos dang bdag la 'dzin par 'gyur/ /yid ches lung dang mi ldan par/ /chos rnams ston par byed pa ni/ /mtshan nyid rnam

par rtog pa yis/ /bdag kyang chud zos gzhan chud gson/ /mtshan nyid can med mtshan nyid med/ /'dres pa'i phyir na rnam par snang / /mngar ba'i rnams ni mkhris pa sel/ /bad kan tsha skyur lan tshwa ste/ /ma zhu tsha ba'i rnam pa dang / /lan tshwa la sogs

rnam pas sel/ /mkhris pa bad kan 'khrugs pa las/ /rims rnams skye bar 'gyur ba dang / /lus can rnams kyi lus yul du/ /'dus pa rlung las byung ba dang / /rims dag rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ /thub pas bsdu ba byas pa ni/ /khar

la sogs yan lag drug /sha dang skol ma khu ba dag /tha dad mtshan gyis 'jig 'gyur ba/ /lus can rnams kyi rims kun to/ /rnam shes rnams ni kun gzhi la/ /phan tshun tha dad mi gnas te/ /gal te chos kyi rang bzhin nam/ /mtshan nyid gcig ni yod

gyur na/ /de tshe chos dang mtshan nyid la/ /mtshan nyid mi 'dra med par 'gyur/ /rdzas rnams bsdus pas sel mi nus/ /mi yang sos par mi 'gyur ro/ /sos dang rnam par bsal ba 'di/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis mthong ba ste/ /gzhan du kun gzhi rnam

shes pa/ /rnam pa mang por gnas pa ste/ /sgyu ma'i bzhin 'khor ba/ /rnal 'byor brtson pas brtags pa yin/ /mtshan med mtshan can med pa ste/ /phung po rnams las phung po can/ /gzhan med yan lag nying lag las/ /yan lag can med

yan lag la/ /'jig rten rgyu yis ma byas te/ /'bras bu rnams la rgyu yang med/ /'jig rten rdul phran bsags pa min/ /phyogs dang gnas su mi 'gro'o/ /de dag sor gnyis sor gsum du/ /ci yang rtsom par mi byed de/ /dngos po yod pa phrad pa'i

phyir/ /rdul phran thams cad 'du bar 'dong / /de tshe yon tan khyad yod pa/ /yon tan rnams kyis yon tan du/ /'jig rten ma byas rang bzhin gyis/ /'jig rten rkyen las ma byung ste/ /'dod rgyal dngos kyis de bzhin min/ /chos gsum pas kyang ma byas te/ /bag

chags rnams kyis dkrugs pa'i sems/ /rnam par rtog pa mang po'i gnas/ /snying gi phyogs na gnas pa yi/ /lus can kun gyi kun gzhi dang / /sems dang yid dang rnam shes rnams/ /'gro ba dag gis sna tshogs brtags/ /'gro ba ma lus rab mnan te/ /

sgyu ma'i bzhin du gnas/ /sems tsam du ni 'jug pa las/ /gzhan du yongs su gnas 'pho ste/ /sa la stong zhes brjod par bya/ /sems ni dngos po'i tshul du gnas/ /rdza la sogs pa'i yul med de/ /sems ni rdza ma lta bu'o/ /sa la gzugs

rnams yod pa dang / /lha yul gnas pa'i khyim rnams dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs gang snang ba/ /de dag kun gzhi snang ba yin/ /kun gzhi kun tu lag pa ste/ /kun tu kha mig mgo bo yang / /cig car ba dang rim gyis kyang / /sa rnams yog par rab tu gnas/ /

bus pa rnam par myos byed de/ /gang gi snying la gang gnas pa/ /de ni de la gnyis tshul du/ /lus kun bkang ste rab tu gnas/ /stong min dngos po gang yang med/ /tho bas ji ltar rdza bzhin du/ /dngos po gang la gzhom bya ba'i/ /dngos po dngos su yod pa min/ /

de ste stong pa'i dngos yod na/ /'jig med ma yin gzhig par 'gyur/ /gzhig bya gzhig par byed pa gang / /de ni rnam par rtog pas brtags/ /ri rab ri bo tsam 'gyur ba'i/ /bdag tu lta ba mi gnod kyi/ /stong nyid lta ba gnod pa ni/ /nga rgyal mi bden brtags

pa'o/ /rnal 'byor spyod pas stong pa nyid/ /gnas ma yin par sbyar mi bya/ /gnas min gal te sbyar gyur na/ /bdud rtsi dug tu 'gyur ba yin/ /lta ba ji snyed gang yang rung / /lus can rnams la yod pa yi/ /lta ba rnam par spang ba'i phyir/ /stong pa nyid kyi

tshul bstan to/ /stong pa nyid kyi lta thos kyang / /la la'i lta ba ma zhig na/ /gsor mi rung ba'i lta can te/ /sman pas btang ba'i nad pa bzhin/ /ji ltar bsreg pa tshig pa'i me/ /bsreg pa med pas mi gnas so/ /de bzhin bsreg bya lta tshig na/ /stong nyid me yang

'gag par 'gyur/ /lta bas 'gog pa'i dus su yang / /ye shes yang dag me 'byung ste/ /nyon mongs thams cad sreg par byed/ /nyon mongs bsregs nas rnam par mdzes/ /thub pa rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnams/ /ye shes 'di ldan thub spyod dag /de bzhin

gshegs pa'i gnas kyi mchog /stug po der ni rab tu 'dong / /ri bong rwa yis ri bo rnams/ /mngon par gzhig bya ma mthong ste/ /'di la mo gsham bu yis kyang / /srog chags gang yang bsad pa med/ /ri bong rwa yi gzhu yis kyang / /su yang thab mo mi

byed de/ /mo gsham bu la su yang rung / /khyim gyi las su mi sko'o/ /stong pa nyid dang mi rtag nyid/ /rtag tu dngos dang gcig gyur te/ /yod dang med pa'i rang bzhin yang / /de bzhin gcig pa nyid du gyur/ /mngal na gnas dus tshun chad kyang / /gzugs rnams gzhig

par brtson pa ste/ /gang na'ang de med gzugs yod min/ /gzugs med par yang de med de/ /khyad par med par 'byung ba ni/ /ma bsgribs zla dang 'od zer bzhin/ /de bzhin dngos rnams stong nyid dang / /lhan cig gcig tu 'byung ba ste/ /phan tshun rnam pa tha dad du/ /

de dag dgos pa mi sgrub bo/ /rgyu dang rkyen rnams tshogs pa las/ /rnal 'byor can gyi las sgrub bo/ /lus 'di bdag yod ma yin te/ /ro langs 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'dra/ /sred pa'i srad bus bcings byas shing / /yul gyi rnams kyis drang ba yin/ /lha rdzas stong pa

nyid bshad pa/ /lta ba thams cad sbyong ba ste/ /mtha' rgal stong pa nyid lta ba/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis lta med bshad/ /stong nyid lta ba sbyong ba ni/ /yod dang med pa gzhig pa'i phyir/ /blo ldan mnyam par bzhag pa yi/ /rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bsgom/ /rtswa dang shing

dang gyo mo dag /sgyu ma'i mkhan pos rgyur byas te/ /sngags kyis ci dang cir 'dod par/ /gzugs kyi dngos su rab tu byed/ /gzugs dang snang ba yid byed dang / /sred dang mig rnams rgyur byas shing / /mig gi rnam shes sgyu ma bzhin/ /smig rgyu bzhin du de g.yo'o/ /

gang gi yul du'ang 'ong ba med/ /yul gzhan dag tu'ang 'gro ba min/ /'di lta'i rnam shes 'byung ba la/ /yod dang med par brtag mi bya/ /skra yi tshogs dang bong bu'i rwa/ /mo gsham bu dang smig rgyu dang / /dri za'i grong khyer rmi lam dag /ming du grag gi yod pa min/ /

stag dang gzig dang dom dag dang / /rnga rta bong bu khyi rnams dang / /g.yi dang mtsha' dang rus sbal la/ /rwa ni yod pa ma yin na/ /thub pa rtsod par brtson pa yis/ /de dag ci phyir mi brtag cing / /bong bu'i rwa la brtag par bya/ /ci go de dag bsgrub nus sam/ /shes rab can

gyis sar bstan pa/ /de dag nyi tshe brtag par bya/ /rtog pa can rnams 'khor ba ni/ /blun po long ba 'on pa 'dra/ /sgrol ba'i ye shes de la med/ /so so rang rig yul yang med/ /gzhan gyis byas pa'i tshul dag la/ /rnam par rtog pas ci zhig nus/ /stug por

gnas par rnam par rtogs/ /de la brtags shing dge ba 'thob/ /rnal 'byor mnyam bzhag rnal 'byor can/ /de na gnas pa bzhin du snang / /lha yul gnas pa'i bsnyems bral dang / /zla ba gza' la sogs pa yang / /rlung gis rab tu bskyod pa'i rnams/ /

ri rab rten cing rgyu ba yin/ /de bzhin rnam par shes pa bdun/ /bag chags rnams dang ldan pa yi/ /kun gzhi kun gyi sa bon can/ /de la brten cing rab tu rgyu/ /ji ltar sa la kun brten cing / /sa skye kun kyang 'byung ba bzhin/ /sems can kun gyi gnas yin te/ /

'byung khungs kun gyi khyad par du/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang / /rnam shes rnams kyi gnas yin te/ /sems dang sems las byung bar ldan/ /dba' rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung / /ji ltar rma bya'i 'dab sgro rnams/ /'od dang kha dog rnam mang ste/ /gtsug

phud can rnams 'dab sgro yis/ /rma bya mo dang longs rtse ba/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang / /sa bon mang can mtsho ltar gnas/ /thams cad chos kyi gzhi yin te/ /rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong / /ji ltar rgya mtsho chu bo yis/ /nyin gcig bzhin du dgang bya

yang / /chu bo rnams ni rgyun mi 'chad/ /rgya mtsho rtog par yong mi byed/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang / /zab cing mtsho ltar gnas pa ste/ /rnam shes rnams kyis nyin gcig bzhin/ /bag chags chu bos rab tu dgang / /ji ltar rin chen ldan pa'i sa/ /sna

tshogs kun du phan 'dogs te/ /sems can rnams kyang nye bar 'tsho/ /yon tan dngos su rton pa yin/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang / /rnam rtog rnams dang lhan cig 'byung / /de ni 'khor ba 'phel byed de/ /gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa

yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stobs bcu can/ /spyod pa legs spyad gtsang ba ste/ /sa bcu pa las mngon byung ste/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sar zhugs nas/ /yang dag mtha' la rab gnas pa/ /sna tshogs sems can rnam sprul par/ /'jig pa med

par 'byung ba ni/ /rnam par rtog med sa bzhin no/ /sos ka me tog mang po'i gzugs/ /mi dang bya yi yid du 'ong / /de bzhin sna tshogs len pa'i sems/ /thub shes yid 'ong myos par byed/ /ji ltar don mkhas rgyal ba'i sras/ /'byung las byung ba

ma yin pa/ /med pa'i blo can de bzhin te/ /log par smra la brtson pa dag /chos dang mi 'thun phra ma can/ /lce gnyis log par lta ba dag /rnam pa gzhan du gnas pa'i dngos/ /rnam pa gzhan du ston par byed/ /ji ltar sgyu ma'i skyes bu zhig /'bras bu

sna tshogs ston byed pa/ /'bras bu me tog de na med/ /sngags dang khong bzos zo mdog bde/ /'jig rten rnam pa gzhan gnas pa/ /rnam pa gzhan du ston par byed/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i sras/ /kun kyang thabs kyi dmigs la mkhas/ /bstan

pa gzhan la ji snyed du/ /bstan pa byas pa de dag kun/ /bde gshegs rnal 'byor mkhas pa yis/ /bstan pa stug po'i rgyan la bstan/ /khams rnams drug dang brgyad bstan/ /skye mched bcu dang gnyis kyi mi/ /yid kyi srad bus btags pa dag /

sems can kun du rab tu 'khor/ /rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi tshogs/ /khams dang skye mched phung po ste/ /yid kyi srad bus bcing byas shing / /lus dang lus la rab tu rgyu/ /'di ni 'gro ba'i skyes bu ste/ /'gro ba rnams kyi don du bstan/ /lus can kun gyi skyes

bu ni/ /'gro yang byung ba ma yin te/ /khams rnams drug po skyes bu yin/ /skye mched bcu gnyis de bzhin te/ /brgyad rnams la yid rgyu ba/ /dbang sgyur zhes ni bya ba ste/ /dbang sgyur pho brang sna tshogs pa/ /nor bu rin chen grong rdal dang / /dga' ldan

la sogs bsnyems bral dang / /mtshe ma'i gnas su'ang de bzhin bshad/ /rdo rje snying po dbang can la/ /rgyal sras 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams/ /dge'o dge zhes dga' 'bod cing / /thams cad mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub ldan rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / /rgyal

ba dag dang rgyal ba'i sras/ /zhing dang zhing na bzhugs pa dang / /lha yul gnas pa'i rgyal sras dang / /rnal 'byor bdag po rnal 'byor can/ /ye shes dbang po 'phrul chen dang / /dbang sgyur lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyang / /thal mo sbyar te gnas par gyur/ /phan tshun

gcig la gcig lta zhing / /rgyal ba'i sras la smra ba ni/ /'gro ba'i lha rdzas skyes bu yang / /mur 'dug bdag smra spangs pa ste/ /thub can kun gyi skyes bu ni/ /thub pa'i khyu mchog khyod kyis bstan/ /'das dang da ltar byung ba yis/ /sngon byas ma byas thob pa ni/ /

sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/ /khams drug skyes bu dge ba'o/ /ji ltar mkha' la bya rjes rnams/ /rnam par bzhag pa de bzhin du/ /sems tshogs ldan pa'i khams kyi rnams/ /gtan tshigs bcas pa rab tu bstan/ /ji ltar shing las me dag gi/ /me

lce gnam du gnas par 'gyur/ /bsreg pa gzhan ni ma rnyed cing / /rlung gis bab na gtan mi 'bar/ /bya rjes rnam par bzhag pa ni/ /mkha' la gnas pa mi snang ste/ /'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khor ba yi/ /'gro ba'i skyes bu snang ba yin/ /bya rnams rkang

pas mi 'dong ste/ /de dag sgro yi shugs kyis 'dong / /bya yi rjes dang 'dra ba ni/ /skyes bu'i sgo nas rab tu bstan/ /las kyi skyes bu bstan pa ni/ /'khor rnams rtag tu 'khor ba ste/ /bde dang sdug bsngal myong byed pa/ /byas pa'i las ni chud mi za/ /ji ltar

zhing pa rnams kyi las/ /'bras bu med par mi 'gyur te/ /don dang ldan pa de dag ni/ /gzhan yang 'ong zhes rmo ba med/ /lha rdzas 'gro ba'i skyes bu ni/ /rnal 'byor can la rnal 'byor ston/ /lus can lus kyi nang nas zhing / /de ni dge ba'i las

byed do/ /'di dang phyi ma'i bde ba dang / /lha yul gnas pa'i gnas mthong zhing / /'khor las sangs rgyas rgyur 'gyur ba'i/ /bsod nams rnams ni rtag tu byed/ /thar dang pha rol phyin rnams dang / /sangs rgyas bsam gtan spyod yul kun/ /'gro ba'i skyes bu

med na ni/ /kun kyang 'bras bu med par 'gyur/ /lha yi bde ba thams cad dang / /dbang sgyur rnams kyi 'bras bu dang / /de bzhin nyid mthong thub pa yi/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyang med par 'gyur/ /las dang las kyi 'bras bu mthong / /las rnams don med ma yin te/ /

'o dod 'bod la sogs pa dang / /mnar med mtha' dang lha rnams kyi/ /lam gyi rgyud kyang yod pa yin/ /'gro ba'i skyes bu de yod na/ /sred pa'i 'khor los 'khor bar 'gyur/ /'khor dang bral na thar pa ste/ /blo zhan rnams kyis mi shes so/ /'jug pa'i skyes bu

med na ni/ /mo gsham bu yang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bong bu'i rwa yang rno 'gyur te/ /bye ma las kyang til mar 'byung / /phyi dang nang gi sa rnams ni/ /phan tshun stobs kyis byung ba ste/ /gang dang gang du 'gro ba dag /de dang de dag 'grogs pa yin/ /lha dang lha yi bu mo'i

tshogs/ /dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i sras rnams dang / /dri za grub pa'i rgyal po dang / /sngags 'chang chung ma'i tshogs rnams kyang / /thub la mchod par 'os pa yi/ /rdo rje'i snying po sras bcas la/ /mchod de gsol ba 'debs par byed/ /thams cad dge'o dge zhes smra/ /

nyams pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul/ /rgyu dang dpe yis brgyan pa ni/ /gzhan gyi rgol ba 'joms pa ste/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan/ /bgab zungs ltag chod tshar gcod pa/ /bdag gi phyogs kyi yon tan ston/ /shes rab can gyis bstan du gsol/ /'gro ba 'di

dag nyan par 'gyur/ /ji snyed rgyal ba'i sras rnams dang / /lha yi rgyal po kun kyang nyon/ /shin tu dka' ba'i bsam yas rgyu/ /brtags 'das rtogs dang bral ba yi/ /rgyu dang dpe yi me tog ste/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi thub dge ba/ /stug po'i rgyan ni bshad par bya/ /

de ni thub la rnal 'byor ston/ /stug po'i rgyan de sna tshogs te/ /stug na spyod pa'i thub pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas kyi mchog /thub pa kun gyi dam pa'o/ /sa stengs thub pa'i dru ma la/ /rdo rje snying pos yang smras pa/ /rtag par dru ma khyod kyis kyang / /chos kyi dngos nyid

shes par gyis/ /dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/ /dngos su stong ngam rtag pa zhes/ /'di 'dra'i lta dang ldan pa yi/ /thub pa'i rnal 'byor mi 'khrul lo/ /chos pa gcig pu rtogs pa yis/ /chos par mngon du shes pa ste/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin yang / /dngos po gcig gis

shes par 'gyur/ /ji ltar ji bzhin bsrubs pa'i zho/ /sor mo'i rtse mos mngon shes pa/ /de bzhin dngos po thams cad kyi/ /rang bzhin dngos pos shes par 'gyur/ /dngos po ji med stong pa nyid/ /dngos po dngos por yod pa'ang med/ /'di dag kun gzhi rnam pa ste/ /stong

nyid kun gzhi rnam pa'o/ /rgyal sras dru ma 'jigs med pas/ /rdo rje'i snying po de la smras/ /lus can rnams kyi khams kyi mi/ /ji lta bur na sems tsam 'gyur/ /'byung ba chen po rgyur byas shing / /'byung las 'byung ba'i ji lta bu/ /g.yo gsher tsha dang sra ba yi/ /khams rnams

ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgyal sras rdo rje snying po yis/ /dru ma'i bdag po'i tshig thos nas/ /mi'am ci bdag khyod dge ste/ /khyod ni dge 'o yang dge 'o/ /rnal 'byor can gyi snying po'i mchog /yid 'ong byed pa gang dris pa/ /sems kyi skyes bu'i lus can la/ /khams rnams skye

'gyur ji lta zhes/ /de phyir dbang sgyur rgyal sras la/ /de ni dge bar bshad par bya/ /de bas mi'am ci yi bdag /pi bang slob dpon bdag las nyon/ /ji ltar mi'am ci yi bdag /khyod dang mi ci mang bcas pa/ /bsnyems bral mang po sna tshogs kyis/ /nam mkha' las ni rab

'dong zhing / /rgyal ba nyan thos tshogs 'khor du/ /pi bang sgra dbyangs snyan blangs pas/ /thub pa dru ma ltos shig ces/ /phan tshun gcig la gcig kyang gsung / /bsnyems bral mang po sna tshogs na/ /mi'am ci dang 'grogs rtse zhing / /pi bang bai dUr+yas spras pa/ /

len cing mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshe/ /pi bang yid 'ong shin tu snyan/ /dbyangs kyis yongs su sbyang ba ste/ /mi'am ci yi bdag po yis/ /rab tu blangs par byas pa'i tshe/ /nyan thos rnams kyang gar byed de/ /nyan thos de dag gyur pa de/ /rgyal sras rnams kyis mthong ba dang / /'od srung

rnal 'byor bzang can dang / /lha yi cod pan la smras pa/ /rnam rtog med pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi/ /pi bang sgra ni bsgrags pa yis/ /'dod chags bral ba ci phyir gyur/ /'od srung khyod kyis nged la ston/ /rgyal sras stobs chen dmu rlung bzhin/ /rnams dang 'dra ba ni/ /nyan

thos g.yo ba'i blo can rnams/ /bag chags 'dam gyi dri ma can/ /nyon mongs rnam rtog byung bas mnar/ /yang dag sangs rgyas sku rnyed nas/ /bag chags dri ma yongs bsal te/ /bdag med gnyis kyis yongs dag cing / /shes bya sgrib pa'i dri med na/ /sems kyi khams las gzhan

gyur pa/ /de bzhin gshegs par rab tu 'gyur/ /khyod ni dbang chen phra yul ldan/ /shes rgya che zhing gtsug lag mkhas/ /dbang po 'jig rten phyol ba yi/ /gtsug lag mtshan la khyod gnas te/ /mi'am ci yi gtsug lag kyang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor dge/ /

sa yi mtshan nyid mkhas bya la/ /bslab ste zla ba bzhin gnas pa/ /mi'am ci yi dbang po khyod/ /sa dang zhing rnams bye bar mdzes/ /khyod ni de ltar rnam mdzes zhing / /thub can dbang sgyur tshogs dbus su/ /khams kyi sems las skyes pa'i mi/ /kho bo la ni sras kyis

dris/ /mnyam sems mnyam par gzhag pa yis/ /thams cad lhan cig mnyan par gyis/ /khams rnams gang du ci tshul gang / /sems su grags pa'i skyes bu la/ /rgyu rnams gang gis 'byung ba yi/ /de tshul bdag gis bstan par bya/ /chu ni rlan rnams skyed par

byed/ /drod ni me'o sra ba sa/ /gdeg la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams/ /rlung gi khams kyis kun nas rtsom/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i sa mtshams ni/ /nam mkha' kun nas rtsom par byed/ /rnam shes sna tshogs yul can ni/ /bag chags rnams kyis rab tu bskyed/ /srid

kyi mtshams dang mig dag gis/ /skye ba'i sgo rnams byed pa ni/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i tshogs kun te/ /rgyal po mtshan ni rnam pa mang / /nor bu rin chen sna tshogs gnas/ /dbang sgyur pho brang bzang po na/ /rnal 'byor ldan chen shugs 'dzin pa/ /rgyal sras rnams

kyis mdun bdar cing / /so so'i stan las kun langs te/ /yang dang yang zhing phyag 'tshal nas/ /rim gror rdo rje'i snying po la/ /mchod pa'i dam pas mchod pa byed/ /rin chen dra bas steng bkab cing / /yang dang yang du gsol ba byed/ /dge'o dge'o yang dag ste/ /dge

ba ldan la rab gnas zhing / /chos kyi sprin gyi tshul rnyed nas/ /sangs rgyas sa la rab bzhugs te/ /dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas yul rnams rab tu bstan/ /rgyal po lha mo bcas pa yis/ /de nas yang du mchod byas te/ /rnal 'byor che can

dge'o dge/ /rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med pa/ /lha rdzas de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /chos de bdag la bstan pas na/ /nor bu rin chen sna tshogs nas/ /bkra shis gtsang bar rab tu byas/ /thub ldan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /blo gros chen po byams pa dang / /

blo gros mi zad mthu chen dang / /'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa dang / /lha yi cod pan rnal 'byor bdag /shugs 'dzin dru ma blo gros dang / /gzungs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / /rin chen gtsug phud 'phrul chen dang / /yang dag ji bzhin mthong ba dang / /mtshe ma'i rab

dang 'gro 'dzin dang / /rnal 'byor slob dpon rnal 'byor che/ /rnal 'byor can la sems ston pa/ /thub pa thams cad don grub pa/ /thub sras 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams/ /'di dag gzhan yang mang po ste/ /rgyal ba'i sras po 'phrul chen rnams/ /so so'i stan

las kun langs nas/ /de dag gcig la gcig bltas te/ /rdo rje'i snying po de la smras/ /chos kyi tshul ni brtan par gyis/ /khyod ni rgyal dbang byin gyis brlabs/ /rgyal sras rnams kyis rab tu mchod/ /sa yi mtshan la mkhas pa yang / /

khyod la thams cad shin tu gnas/ /khyod la gsol ba 'debs pa ni/ /rgyal sras stobs chen thams cad dang / /rnal 'byor can dang rnal 'byor bdag /sngags 'chang bud med thams cad do/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras dang / /'jig rten rnams

kyi ngo mtshar gzhi/ /mdo sde kun gyis dri med cing / /bstan dang bklag pa rnams spangs pa/ /stug po'i rgyan 'di bstan pa'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor bdag khyod spobs par gyis/ /sprul pas bshad pa spangs pa ste/ /de bzhin gtam dang sprul pas kyang / /zag pa

med pa'i chos kyi dbyings/ /so so rang rig spyod pa'i yul/ /lha rdzas mthong ba'i chos la bde/ /'phags pa rnams la de ston cig /phung po lhag ma ma lus par/ /gtugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings ston cig /ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi rnams/ /rnam par

thar dang dbang rnams dang / /yid bzhin rnam pa bcu po yi/ /lus kyi tshogs kyang bstan par gyis/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsam yas dang / /mgon po rnams kyi zhing gi rgyan/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras kyi/ /rdul phran bzhin gyi sku phra dang / /skra rtse

brgya char phra ba dag /rgyal sras khyod kyis bshad par gyis/ /bstan dang bklag dang rnam bral zhing / /brjod pas rnam par spangs pa yi/ /stug po zhing gi dam pa der/ /ci nas thub pa 'dong ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor mkhas pas seng ge ltar/ /thub pas de

dag kun bltas te/ /'gro ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad la/ /brtag par mi nus brtag bral ba'i/ /chos tshul rab tu bstan par bya/ /blo yi mthu yang kun brtags na/ /rnal 'byor can dag chos kyi tshul/ /sngon gyi gzhung lugs nyan nus pas/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dang dbyangs su

ste/ /ka la ping ka'i sgra skad du/ /rgya chen lce yis rab snyan par/ /rdo rje'i snying pos shin tu bshad/ /seng ge ro stod lus 'chang ba/ /mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / /dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i lus/ /rdo rje'i snying pos shin tu bstan/ /kim ka'i sgra la mkhas pas na/ /sgra yi mtshan

nyid grags pa yis/ /mdor na de yi nyis gyur tu/ /rgyal sras de ni shin tu ston/ /sang sang dag pa dbyangs la sogs/ /mthong zhing ring ba'i sgra skad dang / /gan da ra dang ran ldan par/ /rgyal ba'i sras pos rab tu bstan/ /rI Sha b+ha dang d+hai ba ta/ /ShaD+dza ke shi lnga po yi/ /sgra skad mtshan nyid ldan pa

yi/ /dbyangs kyis thub pa rnam par gsung / /dang dal ba med pa'i tshig /zab cing snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs te/ /mtshan nyid mkhas dang dri za la/ /de bzhin sim par byed pa yi/ /tshig gi yon tan ldan pa'i tshig /rdo rje snying pos brjod pa ni/ /lhun gyis grub par byas pa ste/ /sprul

pa'i bzhin du 'byung ba yin/ /thub sras rdo rje'i snying po ni/ /ci yang brjod par mi byed par/ /thams cad yan lag mtshan gyi sgra/ /yan lag rnams la mngon par 'byung / /smin ma dpral ba spyi bo dang / /phrag pa sna rtse byin pa las/ /chos kyi tshul rnams rab ston cing / /

dge ba'i sgra rnams byung bar gyur/ /rdo rje snying po thub pa yi/ /smon lam legs las byung ba ste/ /bre mo'i ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun nas 'dus/ /dbang sgyur pho brang bzang po na/ /thams cad gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin/ /dpa' chen

rdo rje'i snying po de/ /rnam par mdzes la kun lta'o/ /skar ma'i dbang po skar ma de/ /gza' yi dbus na mdzes pa bzhin/ /rdo rje'i snying po rnal 'byor can/ /dam pa'i stan la rnam par mdzes/ /ji ltar skar ma'i dbang po dang / /zla ba'i 'od du bye brag med/ /de bzhin

rdo rje'i snying po dang / /rgyal ba rnams su khyad par med/ /yang dag ji bzhin don mthong ba'i/ /rgyal ba'i sras po stobs po che/ /rnal 'byor can dang thub pa'i mchog /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lam gnas pa/ /stan las legs par ldang byas shing / /rgyal sras rnams la

mngon bltas nas/ /tshig dge rnam par smras pa ni/ /kye ma theg chen theg pa ni/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam mi khyab/ /de la gnas shing rgyal sras dang / /rgyal ba bsam gyis mi khyab ston/ /bye ba'i zhing bzhugs rgyal ba dang / /rgyal sras de dag thams cad kyang / /dri med

bsam gyis mi khyab chos/ /dgongs pas phyag bya 'os pa yin/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul dge ni/ /mchog tu phra zhing dkon pa ste/ /gzhan du gyur pa'i tshul gyi mchog /rtog pa can gyi yul ma yin/ /rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi yul/ /rang bzhin rnams la khyad par byed/ /bdag med nyid ni lnga po yi/ /

de bzhin khyad par byed pas na/ /bag chags spros pas 'phangs pa de/ /yun ring gnas ngan len pa dang / /sems dang sems las byung ldan zhing / /rnam shes rnams las rab tu byung / /lha rdzas tshul 'di mthong ba dang / /gser bzhin rnam par byang bar 'gyur/ /rnam dag rigs la

gnas pa dag /sangs rgyas rigs su de dag 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas rigs/ /mur 'dug nyan thos rnams spangs pa/ /thob nas sangs rgyas zhing gi mchog /stug por de bzhin 'dong bar 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin 'di yi yul ni gang / /ting 'dzin 'di yi ming yang ci/ /rdo rje'i

snying pos gang thob phyir/ /tshul dge 'di ni ston par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i snying po'i rkang gnyis la/ /thub pa rnams kyis phyag byas nas/ /rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med kyi/ /rdo rje'i blo la bshad par mdzod/ /ting 'dzin yul ni gang zhig yin/ /ting 'dzin 'di yi ming yang ci/ /gang

la gnas shing tshul 'di yang / /rgyal sras khyod ni bshad pa mdzad/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan par 'dod/ /dbang sgyur bdag kyang de bzhin no/ /rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med kyis/ /'khor du 'dus pa thams cad dang / /tshul 'di bsam gyis mi khyab dang / /rgyal ba'i sras kyi mthu

stobs dang / /blo la 'dzin pa'i mthu kun dang / /nus sam mi nus zhes bltas nas/ /blo 'dzin mthu ldan mthong ba dang / /rgyal sras thams cad mthu ldan gyis/ /thams cad ma 'gyur mnyan par byos/ /gzhan du gyur pa'i tshul dge ba/ /dbang sgyur lha yul gnas pa dang / /thub

pa rnams la bshad par bya/ /theg pa chen po 'od can gyi/ /ting 'dzin yul ni 'di yin te/ /de la gnas shing rgyal sras rnams/ /tshul dge rab tu ston par byed/ /bye ba'i zhing rnams rab tu mthong / /de dag mgon po de bzhin no/ /rdul gyi mtha' mar thug pa rnams/ /de dag rang

gi zhal ston to/ /dge'o dge zhes rab tu gsung / /'di ni rnal 'byor bzang ldan lam/ /lam 'dis nged rnams thams cad kyang / /ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur ba/ /thob nas sangs rgyas dri med gyur/ /gang yang sangs rgyas ting 'dzin skyes/ /theg pa chen po snang ba yi/ /ting nge

'dzin gyi phra sems pa/ /de la gnas shing rgyal sras dang / /rgyal ba bsam yas spyod yul can/ /sprul pa bye ba mang po yis/ /so so rang rig spyod yul gyi/ /ting 'dzin sangs rgyas mthong ba ni/ /shin tu phra ba'i rdul snyed do/ /so so rang gis rig tshul ni/ /gang la sangs

rgyas gnas pa yin/ /chos 'di mtshan ma med pa ste/ /sgra dang gzugs kyis rnam par spangs/ /ming ni mtshan mas bskyed pa yin/ /mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba ste/ /rnam par rtog pa gnyis las skyes/ /chos rnams kyi ni de bzhin nyid/ /de ni yang dag sus mthong ba/ /

de yi ye shes yang dag mtshon/ /rang bzhin brtags pa ming yin te/ /mtshan ma gzhan gyi dbang las byung / /ming dang mtshan ma med pa na/ /rang bzhin don gyi dam pa ni/ /thams cad lus la kun nas gnas/ /kun gzhi de phyir 'byung ba ste/ /bag chags rnams kyi ri khrod

gnas/ /yid kyi gnas ngan len gyis g.yogs/ /yid kyi rnam shes spyod pa yis/ /yid ni phyin phyogs rgyas par byas/ /rnam shes lnga po yul can dag /'byung zhing phyir yang ldog pa yin/ /rnam shes lnga yi yul rnams ni/ /sems can bzhin gnas lus can la/ /kun

gzhir grags pa'i chu klung las/ /dba' rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung / /rnam shes kun gzhi mtshor gnas pa/ /bag chags rnams kyis brnyogs pa'i rnams/ /yul gyi rlung gis bskyod pa dag /rnam par rgyun chad med par rgyu/ /chos la bdag med mkhas pa yi/ /

sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas 'thob ste/ /mngon sangs rgyas shing chos ston to/ /phung po gang zag bdag med par/ /rab tu rnam phye mthong gyur cing / /chos kyi dngos yod ma bshig par/ /nyan thos de dag mngon rtogs 'gyur/ /bdag

med gnyis la mkhas pa nyid/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams sgom par byed/ /rnam par bsgoms shing spong ba ni/ /tshul bshad bzhin du yang dag mtha'/ /yang dag mtha' yi bde myong zhing / /snying rje med pa'i sras rnams ni/ /sems can dgos pa'i rgyun bcad pas/ /de dag sangs rgyas mi 'thob bo/ /

bsam yas kye ma ye shes 'di/ /sems can rnams kyi bde ba skyed/ /mkhyen cing rgyal ba rgyal sras rnams/ /blo chung rnams la tshul ston to/ /ji ltar 'dam las byung ba yi/ /dge ba'i mtshan ldan pad mo dag /thub pa rnams dang lha dag gi/ /nye ba'i longs spyod rgyu yin no/ /de bzhin 'khor ba'i 'dam mtsho las/ /rgyal ba'i sras

rnams 'byung ba ni/ /sangs rgyas dri med rab rnyed cing / /lha la yid du 'ong ba yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' mi rnams dang / /lha yi khrod du khyad par du/ /rgyal po'i khyu mchog 'gyur ba ste/ /'khor lo can du khyad par du'o/ /lha yul gnas pa'i bdag po dang / /dri za rnams kyi de bzhin te/ /theg chen yon tan ldan pa yi/ /lus can

rnams kyis rtag tu 'thob/ /de phyir rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/ /theg pa che la brtson par gyis/ /mthar gyis bde gshegs gnas rab dang / /rgyal po dag tu'ang 'gyur bar 'ong / /kun nas nyon mongs chos rnams dang / /rnam par byung ba'i yod pa kun/ /rtag tu lus can thams cad kyi/ /sa la kun gzhi 'byung ba yin/ /

spyi dang rgyu rnams lhan cig gam/ /'on tam spyi dang dbang pos kyang / /gtso bo rkyen dang rgyu rnams kyis/ /'jig rten rab tu bsgrub pa byas/ /khyad par can gyi rgyu brjod pa/ /ci nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/ /rgyu med rang yang med par 'gyur/ /bya med byed pa'ang med par 'gyur/ /rnam par byang dang tha mi dad/ /kun

gzhi tha dad 'gyur ba min/ /de ste rnam byang tha dad na/ /kun gzhi rtag pa ma yin 'gyur/ /sngon med 'jig med rtag pa ste/ /mtha' bzhi rnam par spangs pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dag /sprul pa ye shes sgrar yang grag /phan tshun snying po tha mi dad/ /de ni

sor gdub bzhin du gnas/ /sa rnams sna tshogs kun gzhi ste/ /bde gshegs snying po dge ba'ang de/ /snying po de la kun gzhi sgras/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa mdzad/ /snying po kun gzhir bsgrags par yang / /blo zhan rnams kyis mi shes

so/ /gser mgar mkhas pas rnam dag gi/ /gser las sor gdub byas pa ni/ /sor mo rnams la rnam par mdzes/ /phan tshun tha dad mtshan yin te/ /sor gdub ces kyang brjod mod kyi/ /las kyi mkhan pos yongs bsgyur bas/ /gser

ni gzugs bzhin rab tu gnas/ /chos mthong rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/ /sems dang rnam par shes pa'i yul/ /bdun pa'i sa ni rnyed pa dang / /'byung ba las kyang rnam par ldog /'phags pa mthong ba'i chos ldan gyi/ /so so rang gis mthong ba dang / /

spyi dang bdag gi legs 'phags pa/ /thams cad brjod par mi nus so/ /ji snyed yul yod ci yang rung / /sems dang rnam shes spyod yul du/ /sna tshogs snang ba de dag kyang / /rnam shes yin te yul med do/ /sems ni rnam pa gnyis dngos su/ /

gzung dang 'dzin par snang ba ste/ /rdza phru snam bu sogs pa yi/ /yul ni gang yang yod pa min/ /ji ltar ri rab rten byas shing / /nyi zla gza' yi tshogs kyi rnams/ /bral ba med par rtag tu 'khor/ /de bzhin rnam shes kun gzhi la/ /rnam

dag 'phags pa'i spyod yul ni/ /rtag par gser bzhin rab tu 'bar/ /kun gzhi snying por bsgrags pa ni/ /rtog pa'i sems kyi yul ma yin/ /rang bzhin rnam par brtags pa dag /rtog par nus pa ma yin dang / /yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin

yang / /rnal 'byor thub can rtag tu mthong / /yid kyi rnam shes yul can ni/ /bus pa rnams la 'ching ba'i dngos/ /smig rgyu sgra tshogs byung ba ste/ /'phags pa rnams kyis dri med gzigs/ /stong phrag bcu gnyis pa'i rgyan stug po las ji snyed pa'i mdo rdzogs // //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA ka ru NA puN Da rI ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa snying rje chen po'i pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ku sha'i grong khyer na gyad rnams nye bar gnas pa shing sA la'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun

dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa do mod kyi nam gyi thun tha ma la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas/ khyod kyis shing sA la zung gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ba'i gzims mal chos shig /kun dga' bo 'dus byas su brtags pa thams cad

legs par bcom pa'i shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /kun dga' bo ngas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ni byas/ ngas gnas med pa'i chos zhi ba rab tu zhi ba mchog gya nom pa zab pa/ mthong bar dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba/ brtag

mi nus pa ma brtags pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rig pa/ phul du phyin par 'phags pa'i bdud rtsi ni bstan/ kun dga' bo ngas chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa dge sbyong ngam bram ze'am/ bdud dam/ lha'am/ tshangs pa

'am/ gzhan gang gis kyang chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten du ma bskor ba lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba ni bskor/ ngas chos kyi rnga bo che ni brdungs/ ngas chos kyi dung chen po ni bus/ ngas chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po ni bsgrengs/ ngas

chos kyi mar me chen po ni bus/ ngas mun pa chen po ni bsal/ ngas stong gsum ni snang bar byas/ ngas gru chen po ni bcas/ ngas stegs chen po ni btsugs/ ngas zam pa chen po ni btags/ ngas pha rol tu 'dong ba mang po ni bton/ ngas thar pa'i lam ni yang

dag par bstan/ ngas chos kyi char chen po ni phab/ ngas lha dang mi rnams ni tshim par byas/ ngas gdul ba rnams ni btul/ ngas phas kyi rgol ba thams cad ni skrag par byas/ ngas mu stegs kyi gnas thams cad ni tshar bcad/ ngas bdud kyi stobs ni bcom/ ngas

bdud kyi gnas ni g.yo bar byas/ ngas seng ge'i sgra ni bsgrags/ ngas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ni byas/ ngas skyes bu dam pa'i las ni mthar phyung / ngas sngon gyi yi dam ni yongs su rdzogs par byas/ ngas chos kyi tshul ni byin gyis brlabs/ ngas nyan thos chen po

rnams las byed du ni btsud/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lung ni bstan zin te/ kun dga' bo mya ngan las 'da' ba ma gtogs par phyis bya ba nga la med do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa

kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rnam pa de lta bu de thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste mi dga' zhing mya ngan chen po'i zug rngus zug par gyur nas rab tu ngus te mchi ma zag bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rab tu myur

bar mya ngan las 'da' zhing bde bar gshegs pa rab tu myur bar mya ngan las 'da' ste/ 'jig rten gyi mig rab tu myur bar mi snang bar 'gyur/ rab tu myur bar 'jig rten mgon ma mchis pa dang skyabs ma mchis pa dang / yongs su 'dren pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /

de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chog gis mya ngan ma byed cig /smre sngags ma 'don cig /gang gnas pa dang byung ba dang 'dus byas pa dang bsags pa ni rab tu 'jig pa'i chos can yin pas mi 'jig par

ga la 'gyur te de ni gnas med do/ /kun dga' bo ngas thog ma nyid du khyed la dga' ba dang sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba rnams dang tha dad du 'gyur zhing 'gyes par 'gyur bral bar 'gyur bye bar 'gyur ro zhes ma bstan tam/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis nga la byams pa'i lus kyi las

phan pa dang bde ba dang gnyis su med pa dang tshad med pa dang / mi 'thun pa med pas bsnyen bkur byas so/ /kun dga' bo gang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi 'khor du bcas pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa la bskal pa'am bskal pa las

lhag par bsnyen bkur byas bas gang de bzhin gshegs pa la yud tsam zhig bsnyen bkur byas pa de de bas 'bras bu shin tu ches kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed cig /smre sngags ma 'don cig /kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa ni

don che ba dang 'bras bu che ba dang phan yon che ba dang rgya che ba dang bdud rtsi dang 'dra ba dang / bdud rtsi la 'bab pa dang / bdud rtsi'i mthar 'gyur ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mchi ma phyis nas smre sngags 'don cing shing sA la

zung gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ba'i gzims mal bcas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shing sA la zung ga la ba der gshegs nas shing sA la zung gi bar du seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal lo/ /gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shing

sA la zung gi bar du seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal bar gyur pa de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na shing dang rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal tha na sor bzhi tsam po yan cad ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad gang du de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan

las 'da' ba de logs su gzhol 'dud/ rab tu 'dud cing mngon par 'dud par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na klung ngam 'bab chu'am chu mig gam mtsho'am lteng ka'am khron pa'am rdzing ngam/ pad ma dkar po 'bab pa ji snyed yod pa

de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus byin gyis brlabs pas mi 'bab par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bya mang po dang / mang po sna tshogs ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus sgra mi 'byin par 'khod

cing mi za mi rgyu bar gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od dam/ skar ma'i gzugs sam/ nor bu'am me 'am srin bu me khyer gyi 'od ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus mi mngon mi snang ste/ lham mer ma

yin/ lhan ner ma yin/ lhang nger ma yin par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can dmyal ba chen po'i me ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus zhi bar gyur/ mi 'bar bar gyur/ mi tsha bar gyur/ mi tshig par

gyur/ yongs su mi gdung bar gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gang sems can dmyal ba chen po'i me de dag thams cad kyang nye bar zhi zhing bsil bar gyur to/ /de nas sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag thams cad skad cig de dang

yud tsam de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus bde ba thob par gyur to/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/ gcig la gcig gnod sems med/ rnam par 'tshe ba med/ rnam par tho btsam

pa med cing gnod pa byed pa med par gyur to/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyang bkres pa dang / skom pa med par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de dang yud tsam de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus bde ba dang lus dang sems tshim pa dang /

sdug bsngal rgyun chad pa dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba mchog dang ldan par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / 'khor yug dang 'khor yug chen po

dang / btang bzung dang btang bzung chen po dang / spos kyi ngad ldang dang / gangs ri ji snyed yod pa dang / gzhan yang ri nag po rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa chen po dang / rgya mtsho chen po khor yug gi 'obs kyi mthas gtugs pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/

'gul rab tu 'gul/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ ldeg rab tu ldeg par gyur to/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor yang de'i tshe mi ldang bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe skad cig de dang yud tsam de na sems can thams cad kyang las byed pa rnams btang

bar gyur te gnyid med/ chod pa med sgrib pa med rtsom pa med cing mi 'dzer bar gyur te sgra chung ca co chung zhing yid mi g.yeng bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang / klu dang /

gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi gnas rnams mog mog por gyur te 'od med gzi brjid

med par gyur par shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye

chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi stan dang skyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang rnams la mi dga' bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag thams cad 'khor dang bcas par skyo zhing yid byung bar gyur to/ /stong gsum

gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na tshangs pa dang tshangs pa chen po gang dag zil gyis gnon cing zil gyis mi non pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba 'di snyam du sems shing bdag cag gis sems can 'di dag byas/ bdag cag gis sems can 'di dag sprul/ bdag

cag gis 'jig rten byas/ bdag cag gis 'jig rten sprul to snyam du de ltar shes pa'i tshangs pa dang tshangs pa chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa de dag kyang rang rang gi stan la mngon par mi dga' bar gyur to/ /rang rang gi gnas thams

cad dang ldan pa yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus mog mog por gyur par shes so/ /de bzhin du tshangs pa gzhan thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus rang rang gi gnas rnams mog mog por gyur par shes te rang rang gi gnas rnams la mi dga' bar gyur to/ /'jig rten skyong ba dang

dbang phyug chen po dang gnas gtsang ma pa rnams kyang rang rang gi gnas rnams la mi dga' bar gyur to/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa chen po de 'di snyam du gang gis bdag rang gi gnas la mi dga' bar gyur pa de su'i snga ltas yin snyam du sems so/ /de nas stong

gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang ldan pa la bltas so/ /des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de la bltas nas 'di snyam du gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i byed pa

po dbang phyug bdag po dbang sgyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de do mod mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/ gang gis bdag rang gi stan la 'dug par mi dga' ba dang / gang gis cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba

'di lta bu dag snang bar gyur pa 'di ni de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i snga ltas yin 'di ni de'i mthu yin no snyam du sems te/ de mi dga' zhing yid dung zhes byed de spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas tshangs pa'i 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te myur ba myur bar

par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po na tshangs pa lhag ma lus par gyur pa dang / ma 'dus pa dang / tshangs pa de las gzhan pa ji snyed yod pa de dag 'phags pa'i chos la mngon par dul bar gyur/ 'phags pa'i chos la gnas

par gyur to/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gnas par bgyi ba dang ji ltar

bsgrub par bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa khyod nga ni tshangs pa/ tshangs pa chen po zil gyis gnon cing zil gyis mi non pa kun

shes pa dang ldan pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang bsgyur ba yin te/ bdag gis sems can rnams byas/ bdag gis sems can rnams sprul/ bdag gis 'jig rten byas/ bdag gis 'jig rten sprul to zhes de snyam du sems shing de skad zer zhe na bden nam/ gsol

pa bcom ldan 'das mad do/ /bde bar gshegs pa mad do/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa khyod sus byas/ sus sprul/ de nas tshangs pa chen po cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /tshangs pa chen po de cang mi smra bar gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces

bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa gang gi tshe bskal pas bsregs pa de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur par 'gyur ba'i dus de dang tshe de 'byung ba de tshangs pa

khyod nyid kyis byas sam/ khyod kyis sprul tam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sa chen po 'di ni chu'i phung po la brten/ chu yang rlung la brten/ rlung yang nam mkha' la brten te 'phang du dpag tshad drug khri brgyad

stong yod cing mi 'jig pa de la ji snyam du sems/ 'di khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul tam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang na lha'i

bu dag lam me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin zhing gzhal med khang rnams stong par 'khod pa'i dus de dang tshe de 'byung ba de la ji snyam du sems/ tshangs pa de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das

ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ gang sos ka dang / dbyar dang / ston dang / dgun dang / dgun smad dang / dpyid kyi dus tshigs de dag la khyod ji snyam du sems/ de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin

nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang chu'am/ me long gi dkyil 'khor ram/ 'bru mar dang mar gyi snod dam/ nor bu dang shel rnams kyi nang ngam/ de las gzhan pa'i snod dag pa rnams la gzugs brnyan rnam pa sna

tshogs snang ba 'di lta ste shing ljon pa dang nags tshal dang kun dga' ra ba dang skyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang snang ba'am/ grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal snang ba'am/ glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / lug dang / dang /

bya rnams snang ba'am/ zla ba dang nyi ma dang skar ma'i tshogs rnams snang ba'am/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku snang ba'am/ sa dang ri dang klung snang ba'am/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang de

las gzhan pa'i sems can mi dang mi ma yin pa snang ba de dag tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa g.yang sa dang ri dang ri'i 'bab chu dang

rdzing rnams na dung dang rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang glu gar dang dang bya dang mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyi sgra'i brag ca dang / gang de dang 'thun pa'i sgra brnyan 'byung ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi rmi lam na gzugs sna tshogs mthong ba dang / sgra sna tshogs thos pa dang / dri sna tshogs snom pa dang / ro sna tshogs myong ba dang / reg bya sna tshogs reg pa dang /

chos sna tshogs shes pa dang / dga' ba dang rtse ba sna tshogs myong ba dang / mchi ma byung ba dang ngu ba dang 'jigs pa dang skrag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba mthong ba'am/ myong ba'am shes pa de dag tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin

gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi 'jigs pa dang / mi dga' ba dang mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa de dag

tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi mdzes pa'am mi sdug pa'am/ longs spyod che ba'am longs spyod chung ba

'am/ dbul ba'am/ bsod nams che ba'am/ tshul khrims bzang ba'am/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'am/ shes rab bzang ba'am/ shes rab 'chal pa de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyis 'jigs pa'am/ skrag pa'am/ gnod pa'am/ rnam par 'tshe ba'am/ rnam par tho 'tshams pa 'di lta ste/ mtshon cha dang me dang chu dang rlung dmar dang dug dang

gcan gzan khro bo dang dgra dang mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa'am/ gzhan gnod pa byed pa'i 'jigs pa sna tshogs de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa sems can rnams kyi nad rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / 'dus pa dang / dus dang / khams mi 'thun pa las gyur pa'am/ gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa dang / sngon gyi las

kyi sgrib pa las gyur pa 'di lta ste/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus na ba dang / sems can rnams kyi yid la gdung ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang mu ge dang / chu dang / 'brog dang / sbrul dang / chom rkun dang / dgon pa dang / mtshon cha dang / nad dang / bar gyi bskal pa de dag tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin

gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs pha ma dang / spun dang / sring mo dang / grogs dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dang /

bu pho dang / chung ma dang / bu mo dag dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ gang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs

yang ba'i las la sbyor ba/ skra dang phabs dang rgya skyegs dang 'khor lo 'tshong pa'am/ rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba dang / 'brog dgon par 'jug pa'am/ phyogs sna tshogs su skyas 'degs pa'am/ zhing gi las rgya cher byed pa'am/ de las gzhan pa'i bya ba sna tshogs

de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par

len pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha dang mi'i rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / gang sems can rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / legs par spyad pa rnams sam/ gang 'jig rten na mi

dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam sems can rnams la mi phan pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang gnod pa dang / ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang /

du smra ba dang phra ma dang ngag rtsub po dang tshig kyal pa dang brnab sems dang gnod sems dang / log par lta ba de rnams kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags

so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi gnod byed kyi sdug bsngal 'di lta ste/ mgo gcad pa dang lag pa dang rkang pa dang rna ba dang sna gcad pa'am/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad gcad pa'am/ mer bsregs pa dang / 'bru mar

gyis gtor ba dang / srog dang dbral ba dang ral gri dang mdung thung dang / mtshon rtse gnyis pas gdab pa dang / gsad pa dang bcing ba dang go rar gzhug pa dang 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis

byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i gzhis ma la log par spyod pa dang / sring mo la log par spyod pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la log

par spyod pa dang / sdig pa'i las thams cad la lhag par spyod pa de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams

kyi gnod par byed pa sna tshogs byad dang ro langs dang rig sngags dang sngags dang sman dang 'byung po dang gdon 'bebs pa dang / gang de las gzhan pa dug sbyor ba dang / gang sems can rnams la gnod par 'gyur ba dang / srog dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / srog 'chad par

'gyur ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ gang rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten thams cad du spang du mi rung ba'i 'jig rten gyi chos 'di lta

ste/ skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa dang / mi rtag pa'i chos nyid dang / zad pa'i chos nyid dang / 'gyur ba'i chos nyid dang / mdza' ba dang dga' ba thams cad dang tha dad du 'gyur ba dang / med par 'gyur ba dang bral

bar 'gyur ba dang bye bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang

dang gti mug dang sgrib pa dang chod pa dang bag la nyal dang kun nas dkris pa dang kun tu sbyor ba rnams dang de las gzhan pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'jug pa gang gis sems can rnams chags par 'gyur ba dang / sdang bar 'gyur ba dang rmongs par 'gyur ba dang /

las mngon par 'du bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pa de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang 'di sems can

dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten ngan 'gro rnam pa gsum po gang na sems can rnams gnod byed rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs

pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang 'di 'byung po'i tshogs dang / sa bon gyi tshogs dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal chu na gnas pa dang / thang la gnas pa'am me tog

gi shing dang 'bras bu'i shing dang spos shing rnam pa sna tshogs sam/ mngar ba dang / kha ba dang / lan tshwa dang / skyur ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba'i ro'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i mngon par grub pa gang sems can

rnams la phan pa dang gnod par 'gyur ba de la ji snyam du sems/ tshangs pa de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang 'gro ba lnga po

dag na yongs su 'khor bar skye ba dang 'chi 'pho ba dang 'thon pa dang 'byung ba dang 'jig pa 'di dag dang / tshangs pa gang sems can ma rig pa'i sgrib pa dang / sred pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan pa kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba de dag gi sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon pa dang / tshangs pa

ma 'ongs pa'i 'khor ba'i lam rgyud ma chad pa gang na lha dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bcas pa'i skye dgu thags 'khrugs pa lta bu/ dru gu 'dzings pa lta bu 'ong ba dang / 'gro bar gyur pa 'jig rten 'di

nas 'jig rten pha rol dang / 'jig rten pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba/ 'khor ba las 'byung ba mi shes pa de dag la ji snyam du sems/ tshangs pa de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'o na tshangs pa khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar ngas sems can 'di dag byas/ ngas sprul/ ngas byin gyis brlabs/ ngas 'jig rten byas/ ngas sprul/ ngas

byin gyis brlabs snyam du sems/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ma 'tshal ba/ rtag tu lta bar gyur pa ma spangs pas phyin ci log tu gyur pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rtag tu ma thos pas

sems can rnams bdag gis bgyis/ bdag gis sprul/ 'jig rten bdag gis bgyis/ 'jig rten bdag gis sprul zhes bgyi ba sdig pa can gyi lta bar gyur pa 'di lta bur gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di nyid bdag zhu'o/ /bcom ldan

'das 'jig rten 'di sus bgyis/ 'jig rten 'di sus sprul/ sems can rnams sus bgyis/ sus sprul/ bcom ldan 'das 'di su'i mthu lags/ sus byin gyis brlabs/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa de la 'di skad ces

bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa 'jig rten ni las kyis byas las kyis sprul to/ /sems can rnams ni las kyis byas/ las kyi rgyu las byung / las kyis rab tu phye ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen

gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i

rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrugs pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur zhing tshangs pa ma

rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag pa nas sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'gag pa'i bar du 'gyur te/ tshangs pa las dang chos kyi kun tu sbyor ba rnams yod na sems can rnams 'byung bar snang ba dang / las dang chos kyi kun tu sbyor ba dang bral bas 'byung ba med par snang ba ma

gtogs par 'di la byed pa po'am/ byed du 'jug pa'am/ nye bar 'jog pa po gang yang med do/ /tshangs pa de ltar 'jig rten 'di las zad pa dang / nyon mongs pa zad pa dang / sdug bsngal zad pa dang / sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bas zhi ba dang / nges par byung ba dang rnam par

zhi ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ /tshangs pa de la las gang yin pa de zad pa dang / nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de dang bral ba dang / sdug bsngal gang yin pa de rnam par zhi ba dang / nub pa ma gtogs par yongs su mya ngan las

'das pa zhes bya ba ci zhig yod de sangs rgyas rnams kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis chos nyid de lta bu dag 'byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba med na chos de lta bu rab tu ston pa mi 'byung gi /

tshangs pa gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe zhi bar bya ba'i phyir khong du chud par dka' ba zab pa zab par snang ba chos rnam pa de lta bu dag yang dag par ston par 'gyur te/ de thos pas sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams ni skye ba las

yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ sems can rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams ni 'khrug pa'i bar dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa de lta bas na 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams

cad ni mig yor lta bu mi rtag pa g.yo ba mi brtan pa/ ther zug ma yin pa zad pa dang 'gyur ba'i chos can no zhes tshangs pa sangs rgyas rnams kyis de bstan cing yang dag par bshad de rnam par phye zhing gsal bar mdzad de 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs

so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi dam pa'i chos nub pa na yang 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad mig yor lta bu'o zhes bya ba de nyid byin gyis brlabs yin no/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'du byed thams cad mig

yor lta bur ma gzigs su zin na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skad cig thang cig yud tsam yang 'du byed thams cad rmi lam dang mig yor dang brag ca lta bur mi ston pa zhig na tshangs pa gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'du byed thams cad rmi lam dang / mig yor dang brag ca lta

bu dang mi rtag pa dang g.yo ba dang 'gyur ba'i chos can du mkhyen pa de'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'du byed thams cad rmi lam dang mig yor dang brag ca lta bur ston no/ /de la mkhas pa de'i mtshan ma mthong ba dag yod de de'i mtshan ma mthong nas rgyu de dang rkyen de dang dmigs

pa'i mtshan ma des 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par khong du chud cing g.yo ba dang 'gyur ba'i chos can no zhes rnam par 'byed do/ /'du byed thams cad ni 'jig cing 'gyur ro/ /dus dang tshigs dang dus tshigs kyis kyang 'jig go/ /skad cig dang thang cig dang phyogs tsam dang yud

tsam dang zhag dang nyi ma dang zla ba dang zla ba phyed dang lo dang lo brgya dang bskal pa dang bskal pa brgya dag kyang 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /me'i phung po chen po yang 'bar nas shi bar 'gyur ro/ /chu'i phung po chen po yang bab nas mi 'bab bo/ /rlung gi phung po chen po yang langs nas mi

ldang ngo / /sa'i phung po chen po yang byung nas med par 'gyur ro/ /ri'i phung po chen po khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / lhun po dang / lhun po chen po dang / de las gzhan pa ri nag po dag kyang byung nas ye med par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma dang zla ba dang skar ma'i

tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa 'di dag kyang byung nas lham mer ma yin lhan ner ma yin lhang nger ma yin zhing slar ltung ngo / /lha yul ba'i lha'i gzhal med khang bzang po dag kyang 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal 'di dag dang / shing ljon pa dang nags

tshal dang / skyed mos tshal dang / kun dga' ra ba nyams dga' ba 'di dag kyang byung nas 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang mi 'di rnams kyang skye ba dang rga ba dang 'pho ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu mdzangs shing mkhas pa 'di dag kyang mtshan ma de mthong nas kye ma'o 'du byed

'di thams cad mi rtag pa'o 'jig go/ /'du byed 'di thams cad med par 'gro'o/ /'gyur ro/ /'du byed 'di thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas skyo bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu mdzangs shing mkhas pa 'di dag rgyu de dang rkyen des khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung

ngo / /de dag dad pas khyim nas khyim med par yang dag par rab tu byung nas kyang 'du byed thams cad mig yor lta bu dang rmi lam lta bu dang brag ca lta bur rig ste/ mtshan ma de dang dmigs pa de dang rkyen des byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /chu'i nang du zla ba'i dkyil

'khor dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dang / skar ma'i gzugs snang ba de dag mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas gdams pa'am/ de las gzhan pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis gdams pa'am/ bdag gi blos brtags pas 'du byed thams cad rmi lam

dang mig yor dang brag ca lta bur rtogs nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed pa dang / gang zag

byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa bzod pa dang po thob pa dang / bzod pa gnyis pa dang gsum pa thob pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i skyes bu mkhas pa dag yod do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa

rnams kyi chos bstan pa 'di nyid 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ de thos pas sems can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po bla na med pa rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan pa dang / theg pa gsum po dag gis nges par 'byung

bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa 'di ltar 'di yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyi brlabs su rig par bya ste/ tshangs pa gang gis skyes bu mkhas pa dag gis 'du byed 'di dag ni sdug bsngal ba/ g.yo ba mi brtan pa/ zad pa dang 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ rmi lam dang

mig yor dang brag ca lta bu'o/ /zhes bya ba'i mtshan ma de mthong nas yang dag par skyo bar 'gyur ba 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs so/ /sngon spyad cing sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i sems can sngon yongs su smin par bya ba dag gis/ chos

kyi sgra 'di lta bu 'di thos nas 'du byed 'di dag thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ 'du byed rnams ni 'jig pa ste/ 'du byed thams cad ni rmi lam dang brag ca lta bu'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la mos par 'gyur/ mngon par dad par 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag gis

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par gyur pa'am/ khyim par gyur pas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yongs su bzung bar gyur pa de dag kyang rgyu de dang rkyen des 'di ltar 'du byed rnams mi rtag pa dang / 'du byed rnams sdug bsngal ba dang / 'du

byed rnams 'jig pa dang / 'du byed rnams rmi lam dang / mig yor dang brag ca lta bu'o zhes 'du byed rnams de lta bu'i tshul du rtogs par 'gyur te/ rgyu de dang rkyen des dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du ma byung

yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs nyid dang sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i rkyen gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin par rig par bya'o/ /tshangs pa stong

gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yin te tshangs pa 'di ni nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad

med grangs med bskyed de/ tshul khrims dang dka' thub dang tshangs par spyod pa dang de las gzhan pa'i dka' ba spyad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gis ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / dus dang tshod

dang snod ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba nye bar bzung ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung ngo / /yongs su sbyangs so/ /ngas sbyin pa dang snyan par smra ba dang don spyad pa dang don 'thun pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis sems can rnams yang dag par bsdus te/ de dag

nga'i smon lam nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skyes nas ngas chos bstan pa'ang shes so/ /nga'i chos bstan pas 'dul bar yang 'gyur te/ brgya byin rnams kyi ma yin/ tshangs pa rnams kyi ma yin/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi ma yin no/ /tshangs

pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang de 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yin gyi/ brgya byin rnams kyi ma yin/ tshangs pa rnams kyi ma yin/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi ma yin/ gzhan mu stegs can dang / spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu rnams

kyi ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'bum phrag bcu'i bdag po tshangs pa de dang / de las gzhan pa'i tshangs pa rnams skyo zhing yid byung bar gyur te/ tshig 'di skad ces ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos rgya chen po dang ldan pa ngo

mtshar to/ /ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan pa ngo mtshar to zhes smras so/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la rmad du 'dzin par gyur te/

ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtha' yas pa ngo mtshar to snyam mo/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa chen po de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi slob mar khas blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song ste/

bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa/ bde bar gshegs pa ni bdag gi ston pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gnas par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol zhes bcom ldan 'das la bka' lung yang nod par gyur to/ /

de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yin/ 'di ni nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yin te/ tshangs pa stong gsum

gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyod la gtad kyis/ khyod ci nas kyang nga'i rjes su 'jug par gyis la dge ba'i lam 'di dang / dge ba'i tshul 'di dang / bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang / chos kyi tshul dang / dge 'dun gyi tshul 'di rgyun mi 'chad par

gyis shig /nga ni 'di'i skyes bu tha ma'o/ /tshangs pa nga'i bu'i thu bo gzhon nu thugs las skyes pa/ zhal nas skyes pa/ chos las byung ba/ chos kyis sprul pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ skye bo mang po'i don 'dod

pa/ phan pa 'dod pa/ bde ba 'dod pa/ grub pa dang bde ba 'dod pa 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de'ang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ji ltar ngas gnas pa bzhin du chos kyis gnas par 'gyur gyis ji ltar nga la rjes su 'thun par byed pa de bzhin du de la rjes

su 'thun par gyis shig /ci nas kyang khyod kyis dge ba'i lam 'di dang / dge ba'i tshul 'di dang sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang chos kyi tshul dang dge 'dun gyi tshul 'di rgyun mi 'chad par gyis shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa ji tsam du dge ba'i tshul 'di lta bu'i rgyun mi 'chad

pa de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang chos kyi tshul dang dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong dang / lha dang mi'i tshul dang thar ba'i tshul nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul gyi bar du rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshangs

pa de lta bas na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di khyod la gtad do/ /tshangs pa khyod la bka' stsal pa ni 'di yin/ rjes su bstan pa ni 'di yin gyis khyod kyis 'di bzhin du gyis shig /nga ni 'di'i skyes bu tha ma'o/ /

de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na tshangs pa dang tshangs pa chen po ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa'i chos la mngon par dul bar gyur te/ tshangs pa chen po de gcig pu ni ma gtogs so/ /tshangs pa chen po stong gi tshangs pa de yang

bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i chos la rab tu btul zhing bzhag par gyur to/ /tshangs pa'i le'u ste dang po rdzogs so// //bam po gnyis pa/ de'i tshe bdud kyi bu ded dpon zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das la dad cing dang ba chen po

thob par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgra thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste mi dga' zhing sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par gyur/ skyo zhing yid byung la spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas myur ba myur bar rings pa'i tshul du

bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bdud kyi bu ded dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gsol pa

'tshal na sman par bgyi ba'i slad du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang lha dang mi rnams

kyi don dang sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bzhugs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ha cang myur du long ba dang / mig ma mchis pa dang / ston pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dren pa ma mchis pa dang / dpung gnyen ma mchis pa dang / skyabs ma mchis pa dang /

rten ma mchis par mi 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi bu ded dpon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ded dpon khyod kyi pha bdud sdig can gyis nga la bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'dar gsol/

bde bar gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'dar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das khyod deng yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab bo zhes gsol ba btab nas khyod kyi pha bdud sdig can la ngas mya ngan las 'da'o zhes smras te/ ded dpon bdud sdig can la ngas yongs

su mya ngan 'da' bar bya ba'i skabs phye'o/ /ded dpon sdig can de la ngas khas blangs pa de bya ba'i dus la yang bab bo/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bdud kyi bu ded dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig can de ni bdag

gi pha ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gi dgra lags/ gshed po slar rgol ba lags shing / bcom ldan 'das bdag dang mi mdza' ba lags te/ gnod par 'tshal ba mi sman par 'tshal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sdig can de ni bdag la grub

pa dang bde ba ma lags par 'tshal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi sgron ma 'di lta bu dang / shes rab kyi snang ba chen po dang / ye shes snang ba'i sgron ma chen po 'di lta bu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal ba'i sdig can de ni/ sdig pa'i bsam

pa can/ sdig pa'i sbyor ba can te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten sun 'byin pa'i dgra lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na sems can sdig pa chen po 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes gang yang dag par smra bas smra ba de ni/ bcom ldan

'das bdud lags so zhes yang dag par smra bas smra bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gang bdag la mi phan par zhugs pa dang / gzhan la mi phan par zhugs pa dang / skye bo mang po la mi phan par zhugs pa zhes gang yang dag par smra bas smra ba de ni/ bcom ldan 'das

bdud lags so zhes yang dag par smra bas smra bar bgyi'o/ /lha dang bcas bdud dang bcas tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu la gnod pa dang mi phan pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / grub pa dang bde ba ma lags pa dang / log par

ltung ba'i phyir zhugs pa zhes bgyi ba ni bcom ldan 'das bdud lags so zhes yang dag par smra bas smra bar bgyi'o/ /chos dang ldan pa'i dam bcas pa dang / chos dang mi ldan pa'i dam bcas pa bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis mngon sum du thos shing mngon sum du

bzung ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang bdud sdig can gyis dam bcas pa de ni chos dang mi ldan pa'i dam bcas pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das khyod ni dam bcas pa 'di la brten zhing snying por 'du shes pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po

la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du bskal par bzhugs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das yun ring du bzhugs na de ni skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba

dang / lha dang mi rnams la bde bar 'gyur te/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste myur du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'dar gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi bu ded dpon la 'di

skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ded dpon legs so legs so/ /ded dpon khyod skye bo mang po'i don 'dod pa dang / skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / bde ba dang grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pas de ltar bya'o/ /ded dpon gang dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la

bsnyen bkur byed cing phan pa dang bde bas khyab par byed pa dang / rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i yul 'khor dang grong rdal dang ljongs rnams dang / gzhon nu rnams dang / blon po rnams la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byed pa la zhugs par

gyur pa de dag ni ded dpon rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba las nor mang po dang longs spyod chen po 'thob cing rgyal po rgyal rigs de lan du phan chen po 'dogs te/ bu dang chung mar bcas/ grogs po dang nye du dang snag gi gnyen mtshams su bcas pa la phan pas khyab par

byed do/ /ded dpon de bzhin du gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal po bla na med pa la sems dang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di lta bu 'di 'bul na/ ded dpon de bzhin gshegs pa la sems dang bas bsnyen bkur dang rim gro

bya ba'i phyir khyod la dbugs dbyung ba sbyin no/ /khyod la dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po'i longs spyod chen po sbyin no/ /ded dpon khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la sems dad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed na dbugs dbyung ngo / /ded dpon khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang dad pa dang / dang ba

'dis nga mya ngan las 'das nas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas snying rje can zhes bya bar 'gyur ba'i dus de lta bu dang / tshe de lta bu yod kyis shes par gyis shig /ded dpon nga 'das nas dam pa'i chos thams cad kyi thams cad du nub pa na bdud sdig can rab tu mgu bar

'gyur ba dang dga' ba dang rangs par 'gyur ba'i dus de lta bu dang tshe de lta bu yod par 'gyur ro/ /de shin tu dga' zhing mgu ba las bdud kyi gnas nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ro/ /de bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos ma thag tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por lus

'thob par 'gyur te/ der yang de mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ded dpon 'di ltar de ni shes rab kyi sgron ma chen po shes rab kyi snang ba chen po 'di lta bu med par 'gyur ba la dga' ba'i phyir ro/ /ded dpon gang

bdag gsod pa dang / bdag la gnod pa dang / bdag mi sgrub par zhugs pa zhes yang dag par smra bas smra ba de ni bdud yin no zhes yang dag par smra bas smra bar bya'o/ /ded dpon de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos ji srid du gnas

pa de srid du bdud sdig can bdud kyi gnas na 'dug go/ /ded dpon nga'i dam pa'i chos nub ma thag tu de nas bdud sdig can rangs pa chen po skye bar 'gyur zhing / tshim pa chen po dang dga' ba chen po dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po dang / mgu ba chen po dang / yid bde ba chen

po skye bar 'gyur te/ de skad cig de nyid dang / thang cig de nyid dang / yud tsam de nyid la bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mtshams med par ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /ded dpon 'di lta ste dper na/ mi la la zhig shing sA la ljon pa me tog

dang 'bras bu mang po dang ldan pa chen po la 'dzegs nas/ des shing sA la ljon pa de las me tog dang 'bras bu yid du 'ong ba yid du 'ong ba dag spyad de/ yal ga gang la gnas pa'i yal ga de nyid bcag na/ ded dpon de ji snyam du sems/ mi de yal ga

chag pa de la gnas su rung ngam/ gang yal ga gang la 'dzegs te bde bar 'dug pa'i yal ga de nyid gcog pa'i mi de yang ci mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa ma lags so/ /bka'

stsal pa/ ded dpon bdud sdig can gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod cing de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nub par dga' ba yang de ltar snang bar ngas bsams so/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nga'i dam pa'i chos ji srid du gnas pa de srid du de bdud kyi gnas na 'dug go/ /nga'i chos nub par gyur na/ bdud sdig can de dga' ba skyed de mgu rangs shing yid bde ba skyed de/ de de ma thag tu bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos nas sems can

dmyal ba chen po mnar med par rab tu ltung bar 'gyur te/ ded dpon 'di lta ste dper na/ mi de shing sA la ljon pa de la bdag la gnod pa dang gzhan la gnod par byed pa ltar bdud sdig can yang de lta bu yin par mthong ngo / /ded dpon bdud sdig can ni bdag la gnod pa'i

phyir zhugs pa yin no/ /ded dpon bdud sdig can ni gzhan la gnod pa'i phyir zhugs pa ste/ ded dpon bdud sdig can de de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par lhung nas/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi bzad pa tsha ba srog 'phrog pa myong nas

'chi ste 'chi kar tshor ba myong nas nga rjes su dran par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bden pa gsung ba/ gzhan du mi gsung ba/ log par mi gsung ba des lus bsdams pa legs/

ngag bsdams pa legs/ yid bsdams pa legs te/ lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang / ngag gis legs par spyad pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sdug pa dang 'dod pa dang dga' ba dang yid du 'ong ba mngon par 'grub bo/ /lus

kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang / yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa ni mi sdug pa dang mi 'dod pa dang mi dga' ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba mngon par 'grub bo zhes gsungs pa de legs par gsungs pa'o/ /bdag ni sngon lus kyis

nyes par spyad pa dang ldan par gyur/ ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang / yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan par gyur te/ bdag las de'i rnam par smin pas da ltar sems can dmyal ba chen po 'dir skyes nas 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa drag pa tsha ba yid tu mi 'ong

ba 'chi ba'i mthar 'gyur ba srog 'phrog pa'i tshor ba myong bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de de'i tshe ngas legs par smras pa thos nas sems dang bar 'gyur te/ de sems dang bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba chen po nas shi 'phos te sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba
